title: The Chat Restriction
body: i need help with this chat restriction that pops up everytime i log in. When it pops up i can manage to exit out of it to play my game. please help. there is no exit out of the chat restriction pop up. please fix this on my account

replies.body:
This issue is pretty dang rare. Can you try logging into your account from another PC on a different network? This may allow you to dismiss the message and not have it pop up again.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
